name: Shoot'em down! (itch)
description:
This is Shoot'em down!, my first game ever, just to try Unity features.

Enemies will bully you while you shoot them oranges. Vitamin C can be killer.

If they touch you twice, you're dead.

CONTROL

  • Move with AWSD
  • Aim with mouse
  • Shoot with left mouse button

Still a very early project to be updated in the future.
